sentences.en: "For heaven's sake!" Dot expostulated. "They're cheap and they're useful."
sentences.cn: “拜托！”多特反驳道，“它们又便宜又管用。”

sentences.en: A little Japanese can be really useful.
A tripod will be useful to align and steady the camera.
sentences.cn: 三脚架有助于调准和稳定相机。

sentences.en: Alternative treatments can provide a useful back-up to conventional treatment.
sentences.cn: 替代疗法能为传统的治疗提供有效的辅助。

sentences.en: Brick rubble is useful as the base for paths and patios.
sentences.cn: 碎砖石可以用来铺路基和庭院地基。

sentences.en: Can you come and make yourself useful(= help people to do something )?
From this chastening experience he learnt some useful lessons.
sentences.cn: 从这次惨痛的经历中他得到了一些有益的教训。

sentences.en: HDTV is especially useful if there are a lot of special effects.
sentences.cn: 有很多特效的时候，高清电视就格外有用了。

sentences.en: Hypnotherapy can be useful in helping you give up smoking.
sentences.cn: 催眠疗法可能有助于你戒烟。

sentences.en: If you're converting your loft, these addresses will be useful.
sentences.cn: 你要是打算改造阁楼，这些地址会派上用场。

sentences.en: In business a poker face can be very useful.
sentences.cn: 生意场上，不动声色会非常有用。

sentences.en: It is very useful to have an overdraft facility.
It was certainly useful to have her there to chauffeur him around.
sentences.cn: 有她在那儿还是挺有用的，能开车带他到处跑。

sentences.en: make yourself useful—get Jenny a drink.
sentences.cn: 做点好事——帮珍妮拿杯饮料。

sentences.en: Once our services cease to be useful to them, we're expendable.
sentences.cn: 一旦我们的服务对他们不再有用，我们就可能被抛弃。

sentences.en: Pain-killers are very useful in small amounts to bring your temperature down.
sentences.cn: 小剂量的止痛药对于降低体温非常有用。

sentences.en: The book includes some useful facts about animal and plant life.
sentences.cn: 这本书包括了有关动植物的一些有用的知识。

sentences.en: The tourist office operates a useful room-finding service.
sentences.cn: 这家旅游办事处提供十分实用的住宿查询服务。

words.tran_cn: 可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）
习惯的；二手的，使用过的

trans.tran_cn: 有用的，有益的，有帮助的，令人满意的
trans.tran_en: helping you to do or get what you want
